Statement: If you don't mind I'd like to see what it takes to be like you. If I wanna learn from the young I gotta watch the young! ...Sorry that was weird.
On second thought I may have been right about that whole myth thing.
Hey, you. What's a young'un wandering around this sorry excuse for a city?
Option 1: Looking for answers. Think you can help me?
Option 2: I've been sent to locate the legendary Arc of Life.
Option 3: Why do you call this city sorry?

Statement: What kinda answers, I don't know much about the world but I'll tell you what I can.
Option 1: How many people live in this city?

Statement: Well there's only a few hundred livin' here nowadays, most of the population evacuated after the flood.
Option 1: Thanks for your time, anything else you can tell me?
Option 2: Thank you, let me ask you something else.

Statement: I used to be a teacher, but traditional jobs sort of became irrelevant in recent years.
Option 1: Thanks for your time, anything else you can tell me?
Option 2: Thank you, let me ask you something else.

Statement: Years ago, there was a great flood that turned this once-great community into ruins.
Option 3: And you found shelter in these ruins?

Statement: The Arc of Life?! 'Tis but a fairy tale!
Option 1: So I've been told. However, it's the only thing that can return this world to what it once was.
Option 2: You're absolutely sure it does not exist?
Option 3: Do you know anyone who may be able to help me?

Statement: Hmm... well, there are many locals around here that are more familiar with the Arc than I am. Wander around for a bit, and you're sure to find a few.
Option 1: Alright, will do! Thanks, Mr. Bustin.
Option 2: Could you be any more specific?
Option 3: You expect me to go on a wild goose chase looking for locals? Yeah, right.

Statement: Indeed. I am 99.9% sure the Arc of Life is simply a myth.
Option 1: I wish I could take your word for it, but I can't give up before even trying.
Option 2: No way. Can't go back now that I've made up my mind.
Option 3: What would someone like you know? Psh.

Statement: I guess I can't ignore that kind of response. Damn that's really inspiring, makes me wanna help.
Option 1: Wow thanks, I'm always open to sharing some of determination with others.
Option 2: You seem almost desperate, guess I can't ignore you either.
Option 3: Hmmm... I'm a little afraid you might try to soak up some of my enthusiasm.

Statement: Oh yeah! This city here used to be a pillar of might in the world! People would travel from the across the world to see the great Seattle Pencil!
Option 1: Thanks for your time, anything else you can tell me?
Option 2: Thank you, let me ask you something else.

Statement: Look kid... I know I'm kinda old but have a little respect here. Heh! Just kidding, it was about a hundred years ago.
Option 1: Thanks for your time, anything else you can tell me?
Option 2: Thank you, let me ask you something else.

Statement: You seem new to this world so I'll give you a piece of advise... the only thing that lies beyond the gates of this city is death. Of course I found shelter in he one place that wouldn't want me dead.
Option 1: Thanks for your time, anything else you can tell me?

Statement: Well isn't that funny, I'm starting to think you might be capable of pulling something off.
